a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Cholera deaths in Great Britain over the long-term, 1832 to 2016
Total deaths from cholera in Great Britain since the first major outbreak in 1832. Data points in the 19th century
represent the total death toll of the major pandemic periods; the number of cholera deaths between these major
outbreaks is not clearly defined. Cholera deaths from 1911 onwards are derived from the Office of National Statistics
Data source: Office for National Statistics; Thomas (2015); Pearson Schools
